segments.text: Good morning , madam . What can I do for you ? !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , madam . What kind of coffee would you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we have espresso , cappuccino , latte , skinny latte and Americano .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Goodness me ! So many choices ! I think I'll have a cappuccino please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are . You'll find the sugar just over there .
segments.speaker: S1
